participant_1.name: James Harrington
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and confident, yet sometimes aloof. Enjoys luxury and success.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Margaret Smith
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a touch of eccentricity. Holds a deep desire for purpose and recognition.
participant_2.background: i am a 56 year old woman. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i have two grown children who never visit. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i fantasize about taking over the world.
